com.codename1.ui
Class ButtonGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.codename1.ui.ButtonGroup

public class ButtonGroup
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to create a multiple-exclusion scope for a set of RadioButtons. Creating a set of RadioButtons with the same ButtonGroup object means that only one RadioButton can be selected amoung the ButtonGroup. Initialy all RadioButtons are unselected.

          Creates a new instance of ButtonsGroup
